Yakshawa deposit, Bukan County, West Azerbaijan Province, Iran

Type: 56

Location: Iran

The Yakshawa bauxite deposit forms NE- SW-trending lens-shaped bodies in karstic depressions of the Permian Ruteh Formation, with uniform thicknesses of 11â€“18 m, overlain by the Lower Triassic Elika. Integrated textural, mineralogical, and geochemical ...
